text: Epitelidas of Laconia was an ancient Greek athlete listed by Eusebius of Caesarea as a victor in the stadion race of the 50th Olympiad (580 BC).Eusebius of Caesarea, Chronicle . His victory marked the 20th Spartan triumph in the category during a period of 140 years. == References == == See also == Olympic winners of the Stadion race Category:6th-century BC Greek people Category:Ancient Olympic competitors Category:Ancient Greek runners Category:Ancient Spartan athletes
title: Epitelidas of Laconia
